description:
Goreinu is a Greed Island player who allies with Gon`s party in the dodgeball game against Razor. His Nen ability is to form 2 gorillas out of his Nen. He seems to control the gorillas and can quickly swap the position of them with his own or also with someone other, friend or foe. He later joins Tsezguerra`s team and is the one who gives Gon, Killua, and Biscuit the remaining cards needed to win Greed Island.
Source: Wiki
name: Goreinu
